doc:
Lila Kedrova https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Lila_Kedrova 0 Lila Kedrova (full name in Russian Елизавета (Лиля) Николаевна Кедрова) (9 October 1909- 16 February 2000) was a Russian-born French actress. She won the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress for Zorba the Greek (1964), and the Tony Award for Best Performance by a Featured Actress in a Musical for the same role in the musical version of the film. Lila_Kedrova ( full_name in Russian_Елизавета ( Лиля ) Николаевна_Кедрова ) ( 9_October_1909 - 16 February_2000 ) was a_Russian-born_French_actress . She won the_Academy_Award for Best Supporting_Actress for Zorba the_Greek_(_1964_) , and the_Tony_Award for Best Performance by a_Featured_Actress in a_Musical for the_same_role in the_musical_version of the_film .
